CustomField.description: If you subtitle is "Karen created an event", and the related user is Carl, the connection between those two sentences would be "with" (Karen created an event with Carl)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If you subtitle is "Karen created an event", and the related user is Carl, the connection between those two sentences would be "with" (Karen created an event with Carl)
CustomField.label: Subtitle - Related User Preposition (No)
